ComicInfo.Summary:
BUCKET LIST Part 2
Deadpool has a lot of unfinished business in his inbox, and he's determined to take care of it before...any sort of bad and permanent-ish thing happens to him. Revenge on Stevil Rogers? Settling things with Rogue? Oh, and doesn't he still need to kill a few more folks? It's time to get Wade's affairs in order. You know, just in case...
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------|----------------------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Mike Hawthorne & Nathan Fairbairn | 1 | | Var | Secret Comic Variant Cover | Gerry Duggan, Scott Koblish, Guru-eFX & Joe Sabino | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Bucket List, Part 2: This Could Be the End of a Beautiful Friendship
ComicInfo.Letterer: Joe Sabino,VC's Joe Sabino,VC's Joe Sabino
